title: Phishing Detection Website
description: MERN stack application with Python ML integration for real-time phishing URL detection and analysis.

title: Saas Tenant Management Website
description: Full-featured SaaS platform built with MERN stack featuring multi-tenant architecture and automated billing.

title: Clone IPL Demo Website
description: This website was developed as part of my internship at ShadowFox using FrontEnd Concepts.

title: Online Product Price Comparison Website
description: Frontend-only application deployed on Netlify for comparing product prices across multiple retailers.

title: Social Media Platform
description: A React-based social media application featuring user authentication, post creation with images, comments, and likes. Implemented RESTful API integration using Axios for seamless data fetching.

title: Weather Forecast Application
description: Location-based weather forecasting tool with 5-day predictions and severe weather alerts.

title: Currency Converter
description: Real-time foreign exchange application with support for 150+ global currencies. Features include historical rate charts (7-day/30-day views), conversion calculator, and favorite currency pairs.
